DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator aim verify whether consumption sheep cheese , naturally enrich alpha-lipoic acid ( ALA ) , conjugate linoleic acid ( CLA ) vaccenic acid ( VA ) , would modify plasma lipid endocannabinoid profile mild hypercholesterolemic subject .
DOC.criteria: 42 adult volunteer ( 19 male 23 female ) diagnose mild hypercholesterolemia ( total cholesterol 220290 mg/dL ) , 3060 year age Pregnant ( plan become pregnant study period ) lactate woman exclude ; also individual selfreported history diabetes , inflammatory bowel disease , pancreatitis , gallbladder biliary disease past 12 month , lactose intolerance screen visit . In addition , history cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) 2 year screen , major trauma surgical event within 3 month screen , enrol . Volunteers follow characteristic also exclude : total cholesterol ≥ 300 mg/dL , serum triglyceride ≥ 250 mg/dL ≤ 200 mg/dL , HDL ≥ 70mg/dL , BMI ≥ 30 , uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥ 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mm Hg ) screening .
